item.title: Log-2025-02-19
item.description: The friend link cards were not visually appealing, so I removed them. Additionally, all nav-link classes now have hover effects: 1.nav-link 2 position: relative 3 &:after 4 content: '' 5 position: absolute 6 left: 0 7 bottom: -5px 8 display: inline-block 9 height: 1px 10 background-color: #0077b8 11 width: 0 12 opacity: 0 13 transition: opacity 0.35s, width 0.35s 14 &:hover:after 15 opacity: 1 16 width: 100% Non-Stop - Hamilton (Original Broadway Cast Recording)

item.title: Log-2024-09-16
item.description: Testing new shortcode audio. Bury the Light - Victor Borba Devil Trigger - Ali Edwards shortcode is as below: 1{{/* audio.html */}} 2 3<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.4/css/all.min.css"> 4 5{{ $link := .Get "link" }} 6{{ $img := .Get "img" }} 7{{ $txt := .Get "txt" }} 8{{ $src := .Get "src" }} 9{{ $uniqueID := .Get "id" }} 10 11<div class="player" id="{{ $uniqueID }}"> 12 <div class="imgBx"> 13 <img src="{{ $img }}"> 14 </div> 15 <div class="text-content"> 16 <a href="{{ $link }}" class="button mt-1" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">{{ $txt }}</a> <!
